verses.text: \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* head \w was|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* stream \w of|strong="H3605"\w* waters \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* eyes fountains \w of|strong="H3605"\w* weeping, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* might go \w on|strong="H3605"\w* weeping day \w and|strong="H0853"\w* night \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dead \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*!

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* only \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* waste \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* night's resting-place \w for|strong="H3588"\w* travellers, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w*, \w far|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*! \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* untrue, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* band \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* men.

\w Their|strong="H3605"\w* tongues \w are|strong="H0376"\w* bent \w like|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* bow \w to|strong="H1980"\w* send \w out|strong="H5921"\w* false words: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w become|strong="H1980"\w* strong \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* good faith: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w to|strong="H1980"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w everyone|strong="H0376"\w* keep watch \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* neighbour, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* put \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w faith|strong="H0571"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* brother: \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* brother \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w certainly|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* tricking \w his|strong="H0376"\w* brother, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* neighbour \w will|strong="H0376"\w* go \w about|strong="H1696"\w* \w saying|strong="H1696"\w* evil.

Everyone \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* sport \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* neighbour \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*, \w not|strong="H3045"\w* saying \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w*: \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongues \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* trained \w to|strong="H3068"\w* say \w false|strong="H4820"\w* words; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* twisted, hating \w to|strong="H3068"\w* come \w back|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* wrong \w on|strong="H3068"\w* wrong, deceit \w on|strong="H3068"\w* deceit; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* given up \w the|strong="H0559"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w says|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H6310"\w* armies \w has|strong="H1696"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, See, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* soft \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* fire \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* test; this \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* do because \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* evil-doing.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w an|strong="H2088"\w* arrow causing \w death|strong="H5315"\w*; \w the|strong="H0834"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* deceit: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w says|strong="H5002"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* peace \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* neighbour, \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* waiting secretly \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Am|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* send punishment \w for|strong="H3588"\w* these \w things|strong="H3808"\w*? says \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord: \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul \w take|strong="H5375"\w* payment \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* nation \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*?

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* yourselves \w to|strong="H5414"\w* weeping, crying \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* sorrow \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mountains; \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fields \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w waste|strong="H8077"\w* land \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* song \w of|strong="H3427"\w* grief, \w because|strong="H1097"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w are|strong="H3063"\w* burned \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w one|strong="H1097"\w* goes through; \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w is|strong="H3389"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* sound \w of|strong="H3427"\w* cattle; \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bird \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* heavens \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* beast \w are|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* flight \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w are|strong="H3063"\w* gone.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* Jerusalem \w a|strong="H1696"\w* mass \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w broken|strong="H5674"\w* stones, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* living-place \w of|strong="H0776"\w* jackals; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* towns \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Judah \w a|strong="H1696"\w* waste, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w living|strong="H0376"\w* \w there|strong="H1097"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wise man able \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w see|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w*? \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* clear? \w why|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* destruction \w and|strong="H1980"\w* burned \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* waste \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w goes|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord said, \w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* given up \w my|strong="H0834"\w* law \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* put before \w them|strong="H0310"\w*, giving no \w attention|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* voice \w and|strong="H0001"\w* not being guided \w by|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w*;

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* walking \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* pride \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hearts, \w going|strong="H2005"\w* after \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Baals, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* teaching.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w armies|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* Israel, \w has|strong="H0834"\w* said, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* give \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w*, bitter plants \w for|strong="H7971"\w* food \w and|strong="H7971"\w* bitter water \w for|strong="H7971"\w* drink.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* wandering \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* nations, \w among|strong="H0413"\w* people strange \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sword \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* till \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* end \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

This \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w what|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H5869"\w* armies \w has|strong="H5869"\w* said: \w Take|strong="H5375"\w* \w thought|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* send \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* weeping women, \w so|strong="H5375"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w*; \w and|strong="H5869"\w* send \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wise women, \w so|strong="H5375"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w*:

Let \w them|strong="H7993"\w* \w quickly|strong="H3966"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* \w cries|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* sorrow \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* drops \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* flowing \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* eyes till \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* streaming \w with|strong="H0776"\w* water.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w sound|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* weeping goes up \w from|strong="H8085"\w* Zion, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* cry, \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* destruction come \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*? \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* overcome \w with|strong="H3068"\w* shame \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* gone \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* land; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H3947"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* out \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* house.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w*, \w give|strong="H0935"\w* ear \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord, O \w you|strong="H3588"\w* women; let \w your|strong="H0935"\w* ears \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w open|strong="H7339"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* mouth, training \w your|strong="H0935"\w* daughters \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* cries \w of|strong="H4194"\w* sorrow, everyone teaching \w her|strong="H3772"\w* neighbour \w a|strong="H3588"\w* song \w of|strong="H4194"\w* grief.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5038"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* windows, forcing \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H3541"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* great houses; cutting \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* streets \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* young \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wide places.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* bodies \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* falling \w like|strong="H3068"\w* waste \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* open fields, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H3068"\w* grain dropped \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* grain-cutter, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* \w one|strong="H1368"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* take \w them|strong="H0559"\w* up.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* word \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Let \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* man \w take|strong="H3045"\w* pride \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wisdom, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* strong man \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* strength, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* man \w of|strong="H0776"\w* wealth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wealth:

\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* pride, \w let|strong="H6485"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wisdom \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, working \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, giving \w true|strong="H3068"\w* decisions, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* doing righteousness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* delight, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

See, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w is|strong="H3820"\w* coming, says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* send punishment \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* circumcision \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flesh;

On Egypt and on Judah and on Edom and on the children of Ammon and on Moab and on all who have the ends of their hair cut, who are living in the waste land: for all these nations and all the people of Israel are without circumcision in their hearts.
